message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you and I'm confident this is a fair price.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I believe this is a more reasonable price for the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, $7,500 is significantly below its true value. I can go as low as $8,750.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,250?
